New Records: Coby White made a career-high nine 3-pointers
Key Match Events: The Bulls outscored the Knicks by 24 in the third quarter
Pre-Game Insights: The team honored former MVP Derrick Rose at halftime
Post-Match Reflections: Details about the game outcome were not provided
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls shook off a sluggish first half and dominated down the stretch
Others: Nikola Vucevic added 22 points and 12 rebounds. Josh Giddey had 15 points, 10 rebounds and eight assists
